Le temps d'une soirée festive, danseurs russes et français se défient amicalement. Zoé l'emporte haut la main, et finit dans les bras de Sasha. Flora, de son côté, cherche une coach pour aider à préparer le concours d'entrée, condition sine qua non à sa distribution sur "Les Liaisons dangereuses"..

programme.title: Best Of... Story Séries
programme.desc: Le meilleur de l'actualité séries par Nora Bouazzouni.

programme.title: Central do Brasil
programme.desc: En 1998, Dora, une institutrice à la retraite, complète sa pension en écrivant pour des illettrés à la Gare centrale de Rio («Central do Brasil»). Quand elle regagne sa banlieue, Dora et sa voisine Irène s'amusent à commenter les lettres. L'une d'elles est adressée au père du petit Josué, dont la mère Ana est morte. D'abord insensible, Dora accepte d'accompagner Josué sur les routes du Sertão (Nordeste) à la recherche de son père.

programme.title: La dame dans l'auto avec des lunettes et un fusil
programme.desc: Dany Dorémus est employée depuis quelque temps comme secrétaire dans l'agence de publicité dirigée par Michel Caravaille. Un jour Michel, qui est marié à Anita, une amie d'enfance de Dany, demande à sa secrétaire de venir taper un important mémo une nuit chez eux. Le lendemain matin, le publicitaire, qui doit partir en avion en famille, demande à la jeune femme de ramener leur voiture à la maison. Mais la jeune femme, qui n'a jamais vu la mer, en profite pour prendre la route vers le sud avec la voiture de son patron.

programme.title: True Blood

IMDb data; ttnr: 0844441, Title: True Blood, --- Description: True Blood: Created by Alan Ball. With Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten. Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"yossarian100","dateCreated":"2008-06-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Love at First Bite","reviewBody":"Another interesting, entertaining, and slightly on the odd side series from HBO that should have more than enough sex and blood for those more discerning fans of our mythical long toothed friends, the vampires.

On the other hand, some may find it little more than an "R" rated soap opera with teeth.

I'm more forgiving. I liked the first episode, thought it had a fairly strong cast, and the story held my interest, even though some of the southern accents sounded a bit strange. Still, having a lead character who is wound a little too tight, there's a reason for that, is a fresh enough idea and Anna Paquin, as Sookie Stackhouse...you heard that right, is well cast.

I'm looking forward to the next episode. Maybe this new show will reach right out and bite you.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":237614,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Eté 85
programme.desc: Alexis, 16 ans, raconte à une éducatrice pourquoi il a été arrêté par la police. L’été d’avant, il a rencontré en mer David, 18 ans, qui lui est venu en aide durant une tempête. Alexis est rapidement troublé par ce jeune homme aguerri et sûr de lui, qui a quitté le lycée à la mort de son père. Ils se revoient, passent beaucoup de temps ensemble. Alexis est engagé dans la boutique de la mère de David. Ils deviennent amants. Mais David est libre, insaisissable et parfois mystérieux. Et Alexis, qui vit sa première histoire d’amour, a du mal à le supporter.

programme.title: Les beaux gosses
programme.desc: Hervé, 14 ans, est en troisième au collège. Comme tous ses copains, il s'intéresse bien plus aux filles de sa classe qu'à ses cours. Après s'être ridiculisé à de nombreuses reprises, il entame un flirt avec la jolie Aurore qui, curieusement, semble avoir jeté son dévolu sur lui. Il en est d'ailleurs le premier surpris et appréhende cette relation avec un mélange d'angoisse et de forfanterie.

programme.title: Walter
programme.desc: Aussi calme et placide que professionnel, Walter Kikamba est agent de sécurité dans un supermarché tenu par José Perez, un personnage assez peu recommandable. Alors que l'établissement est en train de fermer, Samir, se faisant passer pour un client, parvient à se dissimuler dans le magasin, afin d'aider son chef de bande Goran et leurs complices à s'y introduire de nuit. Walter a rejoint sa femme Laurence et leurs enfants, quand son téléphone sonne : l'alarme du supermarché s'est déclenchée et il doit s'y rendre pour vérifier que tout va bien. Quand il arrive sur les lieux, Goran et sa bande sont déjà là.

programme.title: La vie c'est pas un jeu
Diabolique
programme.desc: En 1997, une vieille famille de notable de province est réunie au grand complet dans le superbe château familial. Chacun a répondu à l'invitation à déjeuner d'Hélène pour évoquer la réfection du domaine, mais les débats deviennent houleux lorsqu'elle informe ses deux frères que les subventions habituellement allouées ont été coupées. Les deux hommes refusent de participer aux frais et s'en remettent à Hélène pour trouver une solution. Elle rencontre alors un certain Thomas Texier, un charmant trentenaire débordant d'énergie et d'attention qui s'impose rapidement comme un homme providentiel.

programme.title: Shaun le mouton
programme.desc: Shaun, un jeune mouton, grandit dans une petite ferme tenue par un éleveur aussi sympathique que myope. Mais, les journées puis les années passent, un peu répétitives et Shaun rêve de changer d'air. Avec d'autres animaux, le mouton organise un plan d'évasion. Après avoir détourné, avec l'aide précieuse du canard, l'attention de Blitzer, le chien de berger, Shaun et les autres moutons parviennent à endormir le fermier. Mais leur plan dérape et la caravane dans laquelle le fermier est endormi dévale la route. Blitzer tente alors de la rattraper. Peu de temps après, les moutons, livrés à eux-mêmes, comprennent qu'ils ont besoin du fermier. Shaun part en ville pour le retrouver.

programme.title: Nicky Larson Private Eyes
programme.desc: Au cours d'une de ses missions en plein coeur du quartier animé de Shinjuku, à Tokyo, Nicky Larson est pris dans une fusillade qui sème destruction et confusion aux alentours. Au même moment, Frank Carter, le père d'Iris Woods meurt dans un étrange accident de voiture. La jeune femme, qui se sent depuis menacée, fait appel à l'agence de Nicky et Laura pour assurer sa sécurité. La jeune femme, célèbre top model, emmène les deux détectives à l'une de ses séances de photo. C'est là qu'il croisent le chemin de Christopher King, patron de la florissante société Dominatech. Mais King est également un ancien camarade de collège de Laura.

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: Mexico est depuis six jours le théâtre d'enlèvements d'enfants de parents fortunés. L'industriel Samuel Ramos et sa femme Lisa engagent alors John Creasy, ancien agent de la CIA, pour assurer la protection rapprochée de Pita, leur fillette de 9 ans. Creasy tolère à peine cet enfant précoce, qui ne cesse de l'interroger sur sa vie. Mais, peu à peu, il apprend à l'apprécier. Pita est enlevée. Creasy se lance dans une vendetta.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Dans le quartier de Harlem, à New York, en 1970, à la mort du caïd local dont il était le chauffeur et confident depuis quinze ans, Frank Lucas décide de prendre la relève. Jeune, ambitieux et intelligent, il ne veut dépendre de personne et met son propre réseau sur pied. Utilisant les avions de l'armée américaine, il importe des quantités massives d'héroïne et amasse rapidement une fortune colossale.

programme.title: JFK l'enquête
programme.desc: Après avoir consacré un long métrage de fiction à l'enquête menée sur l'assassinat de John Fitzgerald Kennedy, Oliver Stone se replonge 30 ans après dans le sujet pour y consacrer désormais un documentaire. A travers une série d'images d'archives, le réalisateur reconstitue d'abord la journée du 22 novembre 1963, à Dallas, avant de présenter les prémices de l'enquête qui allait être menée. La caméra d'Oliver Stone se retrouve ensuite à Dallas, 55 ans plus tard. Le cinéaste explique alors pourquoi il revient sur les lieux du crime, et se replonge dans le contexte de l'enquête.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Les Bellas, une chorale a cappella de filles, viennent d'obtenir leur diplôme et rêvent d'un avenir prometteur, plein de belles opportunités. Mais les offres de travail sont peu nombreuses. Lors d'une soirée, Aubrey, la fille d'un militaire haut placé, parle aux autres membres du groupe d'un concert organisé en Espagne en soutien aux forces armées américaines. Sur place, les Bellas découvrent rapidement qu'elles sont en compétition avec trois autres formations musicales pour assurer la première partie de DJ Khaled lors de sa future tournée en Europe.

programme.title: Sécurité rapprochée
programme.desc: Employé de la CIA, Matt Weston est chargé de surveiller un des locaux secrets de l'agence au Cap, en Afrique du Sud. Lassé du peu d'intérêt de sa mission, il aspire à plus de responsabilités. Au même moment, Tobin Frost, ex-agent accusé de vendre des renseignements confidentiels, est arrêté non loin de là. Il est conduit dans la planque que surveille Matt. Bientôt, un commando armé prend le local d’assaut.

programme.title: Les michetonneuses
programme.desc: Venues d'horizons différents, Anissa, Eden et Maya sont d'inséparables copines. Si Eden et Maya sont superbes, Anissa souffre d’obésité naissante. La première cesse de «michetonner», la deuxième continue, Anissa aurait bien voulu mais ses rondeurs la freinent. Elles tiennent à leur liberté et rêvent d’amour. Ces banlieusardes investissent Paris en dépensant ce qu’elles gagnent en produits de luxe. La vie va chambouler cette situation quand Anissa est arrêtée pour avoir volé un sac de marque.

programme.title: Ça commence souvent par un je t'aime
La vie c'est pas un jeu
Je ne mange pas de ce pain-là
programme.desc: Janvier 1885. Dans le petit matin du Bois de Boulogne, Isidore Gustave René de La Vieuville et Paul Adolphe Marie Prosper Granier de Cassagnac s'affrontent en duel. Fernand et Gaston, deux clochards qui avaient passé la nuit dans le bois, observent la scène d'un œil curieux. Mais quand une balle perdue finit dans la tête du pauvre Gaston, Fernand n'a d'autre choix que de demander réparation au baron de Cassagnac. Un duel s'engage entre le baron et Fernand, qui a là l'occasion de racheter l'honneur des miséreux..

programme.title: Life on Mars
programme.desc: Reza, Ilsa et leur fille Remmy vivent isolés dans un campement sur Mars. Dans cet environnement aride, la fillette perçoit des présences lointaines et des cris inquiétants, avant de découvrir sur une vitre de leur base une inscription en lettres de sang : «partez». Alors que les cris se rapprochent les trois humains restent en alerte, face à une menace inconnue. Celle-ci se concrétisent quand deux assaillants armés et encagoulés se rapprochent dangereusement du campement des colons avant que Reza et Ilsa ne les mettent hors d'état de nuire.

programme.title: Madagascar 3 : bons baisers d'Europe
programme.desc: Alex le lion, Marty le zèbre, Gloria l'hippopotame et Melman la girafe sont toujours en Afrique. Ils souhaitent rentrer à New York et décident de rallier Monte-Carlo, pour profiter de l'avion de leurs amis les pingouins. Là, ils sont pris en chasse par le redoutable Capitaine Chantal Dubois mais réussissent à lui échapper. Dans les Alpes, Alex et les siens croisent la route d'un cirque itinérant. Ils y voient un bon moyen de retourner aux Etats-Unis.

programme.title: Sonic, le film
programme.desc: Sonic, un hérisson bleu qui court à une vitesse incroyable, est poursuivi dans les rues de San Francisco par le docteur Ivo Robotnik, un scientifique fou et moustachu. La créature se souvient alors de son enfance, sur une île très lointaine, protégé par le hibou Longclaw. C'est ce même Longclaw qui va envoyer Sonic sur Terre alors que sa vie est menacée par d'inquiétantes créatures. Dix années passent et le hérisson vit désormais dans la petite ville de Green Hillsl, en plein coeur du Montana, où il multiplie les records de vitesse sur les routes, intrigant le policier Tom Wachowski.

programme.title: Les enfants du temps
programme.desc: Alors que le Japon est régulièrement plongé sous de violentes averses, Morishima Hodaka, un lycéen de 16 ans qui navigue sur un paquebot, échappe à une trombe d'eau grâce à Keisuke Suga , un cadre qui lui laisse ses coordonnées. Le jeune homme, qui a quitté seul son île pour tenter sa chance à Tokyo, se retrouve rapidement sans ressources et il est forcé de dormir dans la rue. En désespoir de cause, il décide de contacter Keisuke Suga, qui lui propose de travailler pour lui. Hokada accepte et se retrouve journaliste et homme à tout faire pour le magazine consacré au paranormal édité par Keisuke.

programme.title: Les Misérables
programme.desc: En 1815, Jean Valjean, vient de passer 19 ans en prison pour avoir volé une bouchée de pain et tenté plusieurs fois de s'évader. Une lettre du policier Javert indique que l'homme est libéré sur parole et qu'il reste dangereux. Ce papier infamant fait de Valjean un proscrit, que seul un prêtre accepte d'héberger. Ce même prêtre, dans un geste de générosité amène Valjean à changer. Huit ans plus tard, Valjean, maire et directeur d'usine à Montreuil, s'intéresse au sort de Fantine, contrainte à la prostitution pour aider sa fille Cosette.

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
programme.desc: Dans un petit village de Provence, au XIIe siècle, Balian, un jeune et humble forgeron, enterre son épouse adorée qui s'est suicidée. Un groupe de croisés débarque alors. Leur puissant chef, Godefroy d'Ibelin, un noble, lui révèle qu'il est son père et lui propose de l'accompagner à Jérusalem, en Terre sainte. Balian finit par accepter. En chemin, Godefroy est gravement blessé lors d'une embuscade. Le preux chevalier s'éteint peu de temps, non sans avoir adoubé Balian.

programme.title: Music
programme.desc: Atteinte de troubles autistiques, la jeune Music vit avec sa grand-mère. S’échappant dans un monde de rêve, Music mène par ailleurs une existence pleine de rituels. Un jour, sa grand-mère meurt. La jeune fille est alors confiée à sa demi-soeur, Zu, une toxicomane récemment sortie de cure. Cette dernière ne sait pas bien comment s’y prendre et commet des maladresses. Lors d’une crise de Music, Ebo, un voisin, propose son aide à Zu. il sait comment calmer l’adolescente. Et Zu trouve un livre laissé par sa grand-mère qui détaille la routine quotidienne de Music.

programme.title: Les cobayes
programme.desc: Le laboratoire pharmaceutique Biothema vient de mettre au point un traitement, intitulé Ocy 36, qui influe sur les sentiments de ses sujets. Après plusieurs phases d'essais concluants, la laboratoire fait appel à des cobayes humains pour la dernière phase de tests. Adam, chercheur en sciences sociales, et Charlotte, cadre dans une grande entreprise, en couple depuis le lycée et parents d'un petit Basile, se portent volontaires, en espérant que ce traitement sauvera leur couple. Tous deux commencent le traitement, mais celui-ci ne montre pas de résultats immédiats.

programme.title: Judy
programme.desc: En 1939, sur le plateau du film Le Magicien d'Oz, Judy Garland, encore adolescente se confie au puissant producteur Louis B. Mayer : elle rêve parfois d'avoir la vie normale des autres jeunes filles. Mais Mayer parvient à la convaincre de son destin de star, qui la place au-dessus du commun des mortels. En 1968, Judy, désormais mère de deux enfants, Lorna et Joey, est loin de sa gloire hollywoodienne. Elle effectue avec eux une tournée musicale mondiale pour laquelle elle est fort peu rémunérée.

programme.title: Best Of...Story Movies
programme.desc: Best Of...Story Movies du 29/12/2021.

programme.title: Fin des programmes
programme.desc: Ernest, un gros ours solitaire, bohème et bougon, a accueilli dans sa petite maison Célestine, une souricette orpheline, rebelle et intrépide. Ces deux personnages hors du commun, qui ont des caractères aussi différents que leur gabarit, apprennent à se connaître et à vivre ensemble. Ils côtoient Margotine, Mandarine et Mélusine, trois souris voisines, élèvent des abeilles et fabriquent leur propre confiture. Le plantigrade au grand cœur et le rongeur malicieux affrontent les problèmes de la vie quotidienne, comme la honte, la maladie ou les poux, partagent leurs joies et leurs peines, et s'interrogent sur leurs origines.

programme.title: Double détente
programme.desc: A Moscou, Danko, policier imposant et méthodique, traque le dealer géorgien Viktor Rostavili. Lors d'une échange de coups de feu, Danko abat le frère de Viktor. Celui-ci tue alors Youri, ami et collègue de Danko. Dès lors, une haine farouche oppose les deux hommes. Viktor s'enfuit aux Etats-Unis mais se fait arrêter pour un infraction mineure. Envoyé sur place, Danko doit collaborer avec un policier américain.

programme.title: Le môme
programme.desc: Willie, un jeune policier, ne fréquente guère ses collègues. Seul René, un commissaire plus âgé, semble l'apprécier. Au cours d'une enquête, Willie croise Jo, une très belle métisse. Il découvre que des trafiquants utilisent cette dernière à son insu.

Cersei fürchtet um das Leben ihrer Tochter Myrcella im weit entfernten Dorne. 53 Min.USA 2015. Von Michael Slovis, mit Lena Headey, Maisie Williams, Peter Dinklage.Ab 12 Jahren.

programme.title: Resident Evil
Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc:
Resident Evil: Directed by Paul W.S. Anderson. With Ryan McCluskey, Oscar Pearce, Indra Ové, Anna Bolt. A special military unit fights a powerful, out-of-control supercomputer and hundreds of scientists who have mutated into flesh-eating creatures after a laboratory accident." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120804/","name":"Resident Evil","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmI1ZGRhNDYtOGVjZC00MmUyLThlNTktMTQyZGE3MzE1ZTdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDE5MTU2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A special military unit fights a powerful, out-of-control supercomputer and hundreds of scientists who have mutated into flesh-eating creatures after a laboratory accident.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120804/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mbworm"},"dateCreated":"2008-01-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Scary and atmospheric","reviewBody":""Resident Evil" was a smart and scary game. The darkness and the surprises were huge scare factors. In that famous game, you find yourself trapped in a mansion crawling with the undead because of a mistake made by the Umbrella Corporation.

Director Paul W.S. Anderson makes a fast, dark guilty pleasure of a film from this game with "Resident Evil".

Milla Jovovich is Alice, who wakes up in a creepy, poorly lit mansion at night in a remote forest. She has no memory of who she is or why she's here, but after a group of soldiers bursts in and takes her to a hidden lab underneath the mansion with them, she quickly begins to realize a terrible secret. She and the others find themselves locked in "The Hive", an enormous, elaborate underground structure that was sealed by the supercomputer controlling it. It soon becomes evident that an experiment called "The T-Virus" escaped into the air and killed everyone. But nobody really stayed dead. Now the remaining survivors must fight their way back out of The Hive before the door seals permanently... and at the same time they must contain the virus before it reaches the surface. 

The film moves at a breakneck pace, with some elaborate sets and great cinematography that sets the dark mood well for this atmospheric sci-fi thriller.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":260175,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2002-08-28","keywords":"doberman,cut into pieces,zombie,commando,kissing while having sex","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Resident Evil","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2894266649","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjI4NDZjNWUtNDBkMy00ZTY5LWJkMjEtMmFhZWIxZjAyZjMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjI4NDZjNWUtNDBkMy00ZTY5LWJkMjEtMmFhZWIxZjAyZjMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Tristar"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000170/","name":"Milla Jovovich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1011675/","name":"Ryan McCluskey"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0027271/","name":"Paul W.S. programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous
Bangkok Dangerous
programme.desc: Bangkok Dangerous: Directed by Danny Pang, Oxide Chun Pang. With Nicolas Cage, Shahkrit Yamnarm, Charlie Yeung, Panward Hemmanee. A hitman who's in Bangkok to pull off a series of jobs violates his personal code when he falls for a local woman and bonds with his errand boy." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0814022/","name":"Bangkok Dangerous","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTY3NDgwNGUtNWVkNC00NzQzLTkxODMtOGI5OTVjM2JjYjkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQwMjk0NjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A hitman who's in Bangkok to pull off a series of jobs violates his personal code when he falls for a local woman and bonds with his errand boy.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0814022/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"murlangpabst"},"dateCreated":"2009-03-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"not as bad as it looks","reviewBody":"Bangkok Dangerous, a remake with alterations of the first Pang Bros' flick, makes adequate use of the exoticism of the city, while the line of action is not in disagreement with the mainstream tendency characteristic of this kind of action film. I must concede that Nicholas Cage' performance cannot measure up to the caliber of the hard-boiled, stone-faced, cold-blooded assassin he desperately tries to depict. It was reminiscent of two extraordinary characterizations of the type, one by Alain Delon in Melville's masterpiece Le samourai (1967, and Edward Fox in the original version of The Day of the Jackal (1973). Nevertheless, to dismiss the movie as poor entertaining or highly confusing is more a matter of expectations than of analysis."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":56212,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2009-01-14","keywords":"deaf,pickpocket,hitman,nightclub,rules of profession","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bangkok Dangerous: Theatrical trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2746351897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5NjA4NzkwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjcyNzIyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5NjA4NzkwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjcyNzIyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the first theatrical trailer for Bangkok Dangerous, directed by Oxide Pang Chun and Danny Pang."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000115/","name":"Nicolas Cage"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0947777/","name":"Charlie Yeung"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1395312/","name":"Shahkrit Yamnarm"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0659380/","name":"Danny Pang"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0161152/","name":"Oxide Chun Pang"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011877/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0167271/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010750/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0725034/","name":"Jason Richman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0161152/","name":"Oxide Chun Pang"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0659380/","name":"Danny Pang"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Swelter
Swelter
programme.desc:
Swelter: Directed by Keith Parmer. With Jean-Claude Van Damme, Alfred Molina, Brad Carter, Courtney Hope. Ten years after their casino heist, four escaped convicts trace their former partner to a desert town, where he is now a lawman with no memory of his criminal past." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2112277/","name":"Swelter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU4OTQ4Nzg4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk0MTQyMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ten years after their casino heist, four escaped convicts trace their former partner to a desert town, where he is now a lawman with no memory of his criminal past.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2112277/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Zubacz"},"dateCreated":"2014-06-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Started decent, went downhill","reviewBody":"Having seen the trailer, I gave this film a shot. In the beginning, I wasn't disappointed. The first few scenes were quite good, obviously imitating the cool atmosphere of films by Tarantino and Rodriguez. This lasted only for the first 10 minutes though.

The rest of the film dragged on to include family drama, ridiculous array of stand-offs and completely illogical character decisions. The actors could have probably managed a more believable performance, since the cast was decent, but they had nothing to work with. The initially cool and skilled outlaws break down into randomly psychotic, calm, honourable, greedy, sadistic or thoughtful, at the drop of a hat, from one scene to another.

I cannot recommend this film. It is a forgettable mess, which after the first few scenes, didn't even seem to try to be anything else.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3060,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-05-22","keywords":"neo western,neo noir,gangster,low budget,police shootout","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Swelter","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2478943257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkNTFiN2UtMDc1Ny00MzZkLTg0MjEtMjE0NGFmYmUwMTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkNTFiN2UtMDc1Ny00MzZkLTg0MjEtMjE0NGFmYmUwMTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Swelter"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000241/","name":"Jean-Claude Van Damme"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000547/","name":"Alfred Molina"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1012967/","name":"Brad Carter"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2978815/","name":"Keith Parmer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0404324/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0414337/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0414739/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2978815/","name":"Keith Parmer"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

Ten years after their casino heist, four escaped convicts trace their former partner to a desert town, where he is now a lawman with no memory of his criminal past." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2112277/","name":"Swelter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU4OTQ4Nzg4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk0MTQyMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ten years after their casino heist, four escaped convicts trace their former partner to a desert town, where he is now a lawman with no memory of his criminal past.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2112277/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Zubacz","dateCreated":"2014-06-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Started decent, went downhill","reviewBody":"Having seen the trailer, I gave this film a shot. In the beginning, I wasn't disappointed. The first few scenes were quite good, obviously imitating the cool atmosphere of films by Tarantino and Rodriguez. This lasted only for the first 10 minutes though.

The rest of the film dragged on to include family drama, ridiculous array of stand-offs and completely illogical character decisions. The actors could have probably managed a more believable performance, since the cast was decent, but they had nothing to work with. The initially cool and skilled outlaws break down into randomly psychotic, calm, honourable, greedy, sadistic or thoughtful, at the drop of a hat, from one scene to another.

I cannot recommend this film. It is a forgettable mess, which after the first few scenes, didn't even seem to try to be anything else.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3060,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-05-22","keywords":"neo western,neo noir,gangster,low budget,police shootout","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Swelter","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2478943257","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkNTFiN2UtMDc1Ny00MzZkLTg0MjEtMjE0NGFmYmUwMTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkNTFiN2UtMDc1Ny00MzZkLTg0MjEtMjE0NGFmYmUwMTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Swelter","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000241/","name":"Jean-Claude Van Damme","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000547/","name":"Alfred Molina","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1012967/","name":"Brad Carter"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2978815/","name":"Keith Parmer"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0404324/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0414337/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0414739/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2978815/","name":"Keith Parmer"],"duration":"PT1H36M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Deadpool
Deadpool
programme.desc:
Deadpool: Directed by Tim Miller. With Ryan Reynolds, Karan Soni, Ed Skrein, Michael Benyaer. A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1431045/","name":"Deadpool","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzE5MjY1ZDgtMTkyNC00MTMyLThhMjAtZGI5OTE1NzFlZGJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1431045/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"adamsmith-51004"},"dateCreated":"2021-04-16","inLanguage":"English","name":""Please don't make the super suit green...or animated!"","reviewBody":"One of the greatest anti-hero - the Merc with a mouth - Wade Wilson was once a special forces operative but turned mercenary. After being subjected to a rogue experiment, he finds himself with accelerated healing and transforms himself into Deadpool. Armed with weapons (and a wicked sense of humour) he will stop at nothing to track down the men responsible.

Never have I seen so many fans (or moviegoers), dying to see a character like Deadpool on the big screen; it's a bit like how everyone wanted to see The Avengers on the big screen back in late 2011. It's bad enough that the studios can't seem to get the character right with the disaster that was X-Men Origins: Wolverine. But the respect and love that fans have for this character stayed strong until everyone's prays was finally answered by this movie. And it did not disappoint, because Deadpool lives up to hype by being entertaining and hilarious. While I don't think it is a masterpiece of all comic book movies I did have fun watching this movie. It's a film that fans wanted and got.

I can't imagine anyone else in Hollywood playing Deadpool but only Ryan Reynolds. He was born to play this character and he's the only actor that I think of to do the character justice. Reynolds as expected did that, and has made the character of Deadpool his own. He was terrific as the mouth talking, ant-hero bad-ass. This is Ryan Reynolds come back role after his past disasters roles that mostly involves Green Lantern and Origins Wolverine (that this movie brilliantly makes fun off). Reynolds was just perfect for this character and he did a great performance in this film. He delivered the comedic timing and the somewhat of a hidden charm that Deadpool has. Ryan Reynolds absolutely nailed it.

The writing in this movie was surprisingly good, which I didn't expect for a movie with this kind of character. Of course there are Easter eggs, references and nods to the comics and Marvel movies, but in this movie it's done in such a way that feels kind of refreshing. I know for a fact that I missed a lot of the jokes and references due to amount of laughter that I had while watching the movie. I can say it with a brave face that the writing is this movies biggest strength, because it's self awareness on Marvel movies and itself was all top notch.

I'm so happy that this movie is rated 18 and not some watered down movie, because if you honestly think a Deadpool movie should be rated anything less then you really don't know the character at all.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":966247,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2016-02-17","keywords":"breaking the fourth wall,anti hero,sex scene,mercenary,revenge","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Even-More-Voiced-Over Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi567457049","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0Nzk0NzAzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTk1Njg5NzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0Nzk0NzAzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTk1Njg5NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A groundbreaking 4th wall breaking trailer breakdown of a character who breaks the 4th wall, including extra voice-over on a trailer that includes a voice-over. 8 walls + 4 breaks + 2 voice overs = 1 game-changing superhero."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005351/","name":"Ryan Reynolds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1072555/","name":"Morena Baccarin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2554352/","name":"T.J. Miller"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1783265/","name":"Tim Miller"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0566686/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1014201/","name":"Rhett Reese"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1116660/","name":"Paul Wernick"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

After being subjected to a rogue experiment, he finds himself with accelerated healing and transforms himself into Deadpool. Armed with weapons (and a wicked sense of humour) he will stop at nothing to track down the men responsible.

Never have I seen so many fans (or moviegoers), dying to see a character like Deadpool on the big screen; it's a bit like how everyone wanted to see The Avengers on the big screen back in late 2011. It's bad enough that the studios can't seem to get the character right with the disaster that was X-Men Origins: Wolverine. But the respect and love that fans have for this character stayed strong until everyone's prays was finally answered by this movie. And it did not disappoint, because Deadpool lives up to hype by being entertaining and hilarious. While I don't think it is a masterpiece of all comic book movies I did have fun watching this movie. I can't imagine anyone else in Hollywood playing Deadpool but only Ryan Reynolds. He was born to play this character and he's the only actor that I think of to do the character justice. This is Ryan Reynolds come back role after his past disasters roles that mostly involves Green Lantern and Origins Wolverine (that this movie brilliantly makes fun off). Reynolds was just perfect for this character and he did a great performance in this film. He delivered the comedic timing and the somewhat of a hidden charm that Deadpool has. Ryan Reynolds absolutely nailed it.

The writing in this movie was surprisingly good, which I didn't expect for a movie with this kind of character. I can say it with a brave face that the writing is this movies biggest strength, because it's self awareness on Marvel movies and itself was all top notch.

programme.title: الفرقة الانتحارية 2
The Suicide Squad
programme.desc:
الفرقة الانتحارية 2: Directed by James Gunn. With Michael Rooker, Viola Davis, John Ostrander, Joel Kinnaman. Supervillains Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker and a collection of nutty cons at Belle Reve prison join the super-secret, super-shady Task Force X as they are dropped off at the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6334354/","name":"The Suicide Squad","alternateName":"الفرقة الانتحارية 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM3YzdlOWYtNjViZS00MTE2LWE1MWUtZmE2ZTcxZjcyMmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODEyMTI1MjA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Supervillains Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker and a collection of nutty cons at Belle Reve prison join the super-secret, super-shady Task Force X as they are dropped off at the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6334354/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Lancechristopher77"},"dateCreated":"2021-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"I enjoyed it","reviewBody":"I am in two minds about this film.

On one hand, I really did enjoyed it well enough.

However, I'm in no rush to see it again and it was rather... dull... in places.

Not something I thought I'd ever say about a James Gunn movie.

The beginning is great fun, and I don't know where else they can take the Harley chatacter after this (other than maybe a prequel?), and there are plenty of funny moments with some great action beats.

It just felt a little... I don't know.

Maybe because Gunn was clearly let off the leash he didn't have to restrain himself and so moments that may have been handled with more care were allowed to simply explode?

There is a lot of blood and gore, which is not necessarily a bad thing.

As I said, I enjoyed it, and I will watch it again someday, I'm just in no big rush to revisit it.

A generous seven out of ten.

I've read the Suicide Squad and DC comics for a very long time, and all the low reviews with the 'restore the Snyderverse' hashtag can go away.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":264773,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2021-08-05","keywords":"superhero,based on comic,dc comics,superheroine,suicide squad","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official "Rain" Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1024573465","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWEyNGE0NTAtMWIzNy00MmE5LWEzYTYtOGZmMTZkZDBiZDdhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWEyNGE0NTAtMWIzNy00MmE5LWEzYTYtOGZmMTZkZDBiZDdhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"Our only hope to save the world is a bunch of supervillains -- what could go wrong? Check out the new trailer for James Gunn's 'The Suicide Squad,' in theaters and streaming exclusively on HBO Max August 6."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3053338/","name":"Margot Robbie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0252961/","name":"Idris Elba"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1078479/","name":"John Cena"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0348181/","name":"James Gunn"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283444/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028338/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0348181/","name":"James Gunn"}],"duration":"PT2H12M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 6334354, Title: الفرقة الانتحارية 2, --- Description: الفرقة الانتحارية 2: Directed by James Gunn. With Michael Rooker, Viola Davis, John Ostrander, Joel Kinnaman. Supervillains Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker and a collection of nutty cons at Belle Reve prison join the super-secret, super-shady Task Force X as they are dropped off at the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6334354/","name":"The Suicide Squad","alternateName":"الفرقة الانتحارية 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM3YzdlOWYtNjViZS00MTE2LWE1MWUtZmE2ZTcxZjcyMmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODEyMTI1MjA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Supervillains Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker and a collection of nutty cons at Belle Reve prison join the super-secret, super-shady Task Force X as they are dropped off at the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6334354/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Lancechristopher77","dateCreated":"2021-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"I enjoyed it","reviewBody":"I am in two minds about this film.

On one hand, I really did enjoyed it well enough.

However, I'm in no rush to see it again and it was rather... dull... in places.

Not something I thought I'd ever say about a James Gunn movie.

The beginning is great fun, and I don't know where else they can take the Harley chatacter after this (other than maybe a prequel?), and there are plenty of funny moments with some great action beats.

It just felt a little... I don't know.

Maybe because Gunn was clearly let off the leash he didn't have to restrain himself and so moments that may have been handled with more care were allowed to simply explode?

There is a lot of blood and gore, which is not necessarily a bad thing.

As I said, I enjoyed it, and I will watch it again someday, I'm just in no big rush to revisit it.

A generous seven out of ten.

I've read the Suicide Squad and DC comics for a very long time, and all the low reviews with the 'restore the Snyderverse' hashtag can go away.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":264773,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2021-08-05","keywords":"superhero,based on comic,dc comics,superheroine,suicide squad","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official "Rain" Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1024573465","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWEyNGE0NTAtMWIzNy00MmE5LWEzYTYtOGZmMTZkZDBiZDdhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWEyNGE0NTAtMWIzNy00MmE5LWEzYTYtOGZmMTZkZDBiZDdhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"Our only hope to save the world is a bunch of supervillains -- what could go wrong? programme.desc:
Eliminators: Directed by James Nunn. With Scott Adkins, Stu Bennett, Daniel Caltagirone, James Cosmo. Thomas, widower and ex federal agent, hides in London with his daughter. 3 men break in. Thomas kills them. His photo ends on TV. A US crime boss sends a killer to London." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4587366/","name":"Eliminators","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzY2MmRjOGMtNzBlYS00M2FmLThhMmItNzUyNDNkNDZkZjVhL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjI4MjA3NDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Thomas, widower and ex federal agent, hides in London with his daughter. 3 men break in. Thomas kills them. His photo ends on TV. A US crime boss sends a killer to London.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4587366/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kaefab"},"dateCreated":"2017-04-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Scott adkins following the trails of Steven Siegal","reviewBody":"Adkins would have been great late 80 early 90 when all the martial arts B movie where poring out like crazy after the success of bloodsport, and Jean Claude Van damme and Nico where a slim Steven Siegal showed us some new fighting moves.

But lets face it this poor scenario has been played to death by Billy Blanks, Gary Daniels, Don Wilson, and so on back in the days, this is 2017 and i guess that people have seen enough of the tournament fighting crap, or the bad martial arts plot.

Its really sad because Adkins as replace all those awful bad actors in is b movie direct to video, except for small parts in big feature film where he has so much makeup you don't recognize him he will never leave the direct to video movie land.

Poor Scott is 25y to late."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4185,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2016-12-09","keywords":"london england,witness protection program,one word title,american abroad,home invasion","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Eliminators","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi970044953","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDY2NmYxN2QtMGYzOC00MjcxLWI3YjktM2U0ZTlmMGI3NWUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDY2NmYxN2QtMGYzOC00MjcxLWI3YjktM2U0ZTlmMGI3NWUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 2 for Eliminators"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0012078/","name":"Scott Adkins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3808325/","name":"Stu Bennett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0130736/","name":"Daniel Caltagirone"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2071556/","name":"James Nunn"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0332878/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0179337/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242604/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2535285/","name":"Nathan Brookes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2546393/","name":"Bobby Lee Darby"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Last Legion
Die letzte Legion
programme.desc: The Last Legion: Directed by Doug Lefler. With Colin Firth, Ben Kingsley, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Peter Mullan. As the Roman empire crumbles, young Romulus Augustus flees the city and embarks on a perilous voyage to Britain to track down a legion of supporters." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0462396/","name":"The Last Legion","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmJhOTMyMTMtMDc0Yi00YTg2LWE0MWUtYWY0OTBmZTMzMmU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"As the Roman empire crumbles, young Romulus Augustus flees the city and embarks on a perilous voyage to Britain to track down a legion of supporters.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0462396/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2009-07-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Features exciting fighting scenes, impressive battles and fabulous costumes","reviewBody":"This is a nice production with an average budget, great sets and thundering battles about the fall of the Roman Empire. Although the complete Roman Empire decline and fall took centuries, by the end of fifth century it was simply a battleground for warring rival Caesars and Barbarians chiefs. The Germans gather, take over and pull down the Roman gates. The Goths commanded by Odoacer(Peter Mullan), king of Herulos, invade Rome(476 AD), assesinated Orestes(Iain Glen), father of emperor Romulus Augustulos (Thomas Sangster). The young Caesar is sent to Capri along with his preceptor Ambrosinus(Ben Kingsley). A motley group of soldiers led by loyal Aurelianus (Colin Firth) are assigned by senator Nestor (John Hannah) to free him. They're accompanied by a beautiful Indian warrior named Mira (Aishwarya Rai). Without another alternative, they travel to Britannia to meet the last legion, located near the Wall of Adriano; but they're pursued by relentless barbarians (Kevin McKidd, James Cosmo). Although the Romans had partially withdrawn from Britain and its politics essentially dissolved into chaos. Later on, it's thought that a minor war lord, probably named Artos, did his best to maintain civilization and Christianity in the west of England.\n\nThis is a larger-than-life production with good direction, interesting scripting, and enthusiastic performances place this far above the usual empty-headed historical spectacle. Several action scenes are outstanding with spectacular battle images and thrilling fights. Unfortunately, on small house screens much of the splendor will be lost. You will be left with the wooden Colin Firth and the gorgeous Aishwarya Rai in a love story that was underdeveloped due tho the film's emphasis on spectacle. The picture packs colorful cinematography by Pontecorvo and evocative musical score by Patrick Doyle. The flick is professionally directed by Doug Lefler, who previously made ¨Dragonheart , a new beginning ¨. Rating : Good, it's a nice extravaganza well set in ancient Rome, done in great scale and praised for its action sequences.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":35223,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","War"],"datePublished":"2007-11-07","keywords":"roman legion,woman warrior,5th century,goths,catapult","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Last Legion","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2599747865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk0ODI5Y2QtMzU3Zi00ODJiLWJiNzYtMTFkZTQ5Mjg5NzM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk0ODI5Y2QtMzU3Zi00ODJiLWJiNzYtMTFkZTQ5Mjg5NzM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from The Weinstein Company"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000147/","name":"Colin Firth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001426/","name":"Ben Kingsley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0706787/","name":"Aishwarya Rai Bachchan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498991/","name":"Doug Lefler"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014380/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0120901/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136728/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125336/","name":"Jez Butterworth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125358/","name":"Tom Butterworth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0137363/","name":"Carlo Carlei"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Source Code
Source Code
programme.desc: Source Code: Directed by Duncan Jones. With Jake Gyllenhaal, Michelle Monaghan, Vera Farmiga, Jeffrey Wright. A soldier wakes up in someone else's body and discovers he's part of an experimental government program to find the bomber of a commuter train within 8 minutes." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0945513/","name":"Source Code","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0MTc3MzMzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDE4MjE0NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A soldier wakes up in someone else's body and discovers he's part of an experimental government program to find the bomber of a commuter train within 8 minutes.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0945513/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"toma_kassem"},"dateCreated":"2011-03-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"will keep you interested till the very ending","reviewBody":"I was looking forward to seeing " Source Code " ever since I saw the 1st trailer, and I was lucky enough to catch it in an advance screening, before it officially released here, and it just exceeded my expectations. this is the type of movies that will keep you interested till the very ending . it's probably the best sci-fi/thriller since Inception ! no big action scenes, no big explosions, no usage of unnecessary CGI, well-written story, solid performance from Mr. Gyllenhaal ( who is now officially one of my favorite actors ) and another hit from my newest favorite filmmaker Duncan Jones. don't miss it !","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":504315,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2011-04-01","keywords":"train,time loop,bomber,memory,reliving same event","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Source Code: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3948911129","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2MTQ4Nzg4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTcxMjQ1NA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2MTQ4Nzg4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTcxMjQ1NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An action thriller centered on a soldier who wakes up in the body of an unknown man and discovers he's part of a mission to find the bomber of a Chicago commuter train."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0350453/","name":"Jake Gyllenhaal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1157358/","name":"Michelle Monaghan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0267812/","name":"Vera Farmiga"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1512910/","name":"Duncan Jones"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0251081/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1618286/","name":"Ben Ripley"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Book of Eli
The Book of Eli
programme.desc:
The Book of Eli: Directed by Albert Hughes, Allen Hughes. With Denzel Washington, Gary Oldman, Mila Kunis, Ray Stevenson. A post-apocalyptic tale, in which a lone man fights his way across America in order to protect a sacred book that holds the secrets to saving humankind." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1037705/","name":"The Book of Eli","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTE1OWI1YzgtZjEyMy00MjQ4LWE0NWMtYTNhYjc0ZDQ3ZGRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDQ2MTMzODA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A post-apocalyptic tale, in which a lone man fights his way across America in order to protect a sacred book that holds the secrets to saving humankind.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1037705/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ValianceInEnd"},"dateCreated":"2010-01-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not just another post-apocalyptic thriller.","reviewBody":"Upon first viewing the trailer I was immediately giddy to see a new post-apocalyptic film in the vein of The Road Warrior. Being a fan of the genre, one must get used to the repetitive "lone wanderer" theme so prominently used. I figured this film would go through the same formula, but prepared to enjoy myself.

Yes it did use the lone wanderer as a driving plot device, and yes it did bring the arbitrary twist. Yes all the survivors are short on t-shirts, but live in a wealth of leather and goggles. Yes everything in this film looks like and feels like a typical post-apocalyptia. But the substance of the story is far more powerful then I could ever have expected.

Without giving away too much, yes the film is essentially a Christian metaphor. Eli seems to be protected by some mysterious force, guided by "God" to head west. But it's what the meaning behind this admittedly bizarre plot that makes this film so great. It truly is a film about faith and believing in one's self. Using the dreary post-apocalyptic backdrop, the film is able to contrast this powerful message with the harsh landscape. Even amidst such despair, one can rise and accomplish anything. In a world slowly becoming apocalyptic itself, this message is much welcomed.

The other aspects lending to the power of The Book of Eli are its technical aspects. The cinematography is simply beautiful. Moody slo-mo shots abound with wonderfully toned colors. Everything looks dark and dead, the sun beating down endlessly on the dusty dunes. The soundtrack adds immensely to this feeling, using soft ambient chords and blasting action-scene drums when necessary. Overall The Book of Eli is an excellent film itself and an excellent spin on the post-apocalyptic genre. 

Oh yeah, and Denzel Washington actually manages to pull off the part of a wizened, old bad ass.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":307036,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2010-01-27","keywords":"post apocalypse,blind,religion,bible,blindness","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Book of Eli: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi862650905","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgyNzc4NjE1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzQ3ODY4Mg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgyNzc4NjE1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzQ3ODY4Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A post-apocalyptic tale, in which a lone man fights his way across America in order to protect a sacred book that holds the secrets to saving humankind."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005109/","name":"Mila Kunis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0829032/","name":"Ray Stevenson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0400436/","name":"Albert Hughes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0400441/","name":"Allen Hughes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054452/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019968/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1729428/","name":"Gary Whitta"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

Eliminators
programme.desc:
Eliminators: Directed by James Nunn. With Scott Adkins, Stu Bennett, Daniel Caltagirone, James Cosmo. Thomas, widower and ex federal agent, hides in London with his daughter. 3 men break in. Thomas kills them. His photo ends on TV. A US crime boss sends a killer to London." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4587366/","name":"Eliminators","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzY2MmRjOGMtNzBlYS00M2FmLThhMmItNzUyNDNkNDZkZjVhL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjI4MjA3NDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Thomas, widower and ex federal agent, hides in London with his daughter. 3 men break in. Thomas kills them. His photo ends on TV. A US crime boss sends a killer to London.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4587366/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kaefab"},"dateCreated":"2017-04-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Scott adkins following the trails of Steven Siegal","reviewBody":"Adkins would have been great late 80 early 90 when all the martial arts B movie where poring out like crazy after the success of bloodsport, and Jean Claude Van damme and Nico where a slim Steven Siegal showed us some new fighting moves.

But lets face it this poor scenario has been played to death by Billy Blanks, Gary Daniels, Don Wilson, and so on back in the days, this is 2017 and i guess that people have seen enough of the tournament fighting crap, or the bad martial arts plot.

Its really sad because Adkins as replace all those awful bad actors in is b movie direct to video, except for small parts in big feature film where he has so much makeup you don't recognize him he will never leave the direct to video movie land.

Poor Scott is 25y to late."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4185,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2016-12-09","keywords":"london england,witness protection program,one word title,american abroad,home invasion","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Eliminators","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi970044953","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDY2NmYxN2QtMGYzOC00MjcxLWI3YjktM2U0ZTlmMGI3NWUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDY2NmYxN2QtMGYzOC00MjcxLWI3YjktM2U0ZTlmMGI3NWUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 2 for Eliminators"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0012078/","name":"Scott Adkins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3808325/","name":"Stu Bennett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0130736/","name":"Daniel Caltagirone"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2071556/","name":"James Nunn"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0332878/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0179337/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242604/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2535285/","name":"Nathan Brookes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2546393/","name":"Bobby Lee Darby"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

A US crime boss sends a killer to London.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4587366/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"kaefab","dateCreated":"2017-04-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Scott adkins following the trails of Steven Siegal","reviewBody":"Adkins would have been great late 80 early 90 when all the martial arts B movie where poring out like crazy after the success of bloodsport, and Jean Claude Van damme and Nico where a slim Steven Siegal showed us some new fighting moves.

programme.title: Becky
Becky
programme.desc:
Becky: Directed by Jonathan Milott, Cary Murnion. With Lulu Wilson, Kevin James, Joel McHale, Robert Maillet. A teenager's weekend at a lake house with her father takes a turn for the worse when a group of convicts wreaks havoc on their lives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10314450/","name":"Becky","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTlhYThkYjItZDdmYi00ZGRhLTg1OTAtMDRhZTM5ZWI5NGZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjA0MDk5Mzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"A teenager's weekend at a lake house with her father takes a turn for the worse when a group of convicts wreaks havoc on their lives.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10314450/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tresm87"},"dateCreated":"2020-06-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Usual funnyman Kevin James is intriguing in this cliche villainous role, however the film itself is just an excuse for cheap revenge/bloodshed without much plot.","reviewBody":"I think almost everyone enjoys to see a comedian break away from the laughs and turn serious for a role, or in this case even villainous. Kevin James executes this extremely played out and cliche Aryan brotherhood/supremacist/convict character as well as he could've with what barren script he was given.

Everything starts out with some solid character development with the young Lulu Wilson with her struggles and current emotional situation. As things progress we fly ahead into the start of the action and are introduced to the ever cliche written group of villains with intensity and mystery. At this point it appears as though they will explain a certain plot device in which the antagonists are after, but they fail to do so. Then things start getting gruesome and very fast paced and you still wonder what they are truly after. Towards the final act just when you think they'll explain what the point of all this was, we are once again left hanging without any true explanation of their intentions with the main object they were after rendering the whole story nearly useless other than for extreme brutality and revenge empowerment.

As I mentioned the film has some decently entertaining performances by James and Wilson, and some solid production value, but there is almost no story here. If they would've simply given an explanation to the motives of these convicts and wrapped up some loose ends, it could've been slightly better. Instead it just feels like a hollow and cliche revenge thriller.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":15402,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-06-05","keywords":"home invasion,father daughter relationship,key,fiance fiancee relationship,aryan brotherhood","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1658306073","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODJhNmUxODYtYTM3Yy00YTYzLTljMDUtNjNhY2U3Njc2MDUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODJhNmUxODYtYTM3Yy00YTYzLTljMDUtNjNhY2U3Njc2MDUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"Spunky and rebellious, Becky (Lulu Wilson) is brought to a weekend getaway at a lake house by her father Jeff (Joel McHale) in an effort to try to reconnect. The trip immediately takes a turn for the worse when a group of convicts on the run, led by the merciless Dominick (Kevin James), suddenly invade the lake house."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5157662/","name":"Lulu Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0416673/","name":"Kevin James"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0570364/","name":"Joel McHale"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5732579/","name":"Jonathan Milott"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5722382/","name":"Cary Murnion"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0303286/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0474730/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0378412/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1460195/","name":"Ruckus Skye"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1864206/","name":"Lane Skye"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10686634/","name":"Nick Morris"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Last Legion
Die letzte Legion
programme.desc: The Last Legion: Directed by Doug Lefler. With Colin Firth, Ben Kingsley, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Peter Mullan. As the Roman empire crumbles, young Romulus Augustus flees the city and embarks on a perilous voyage to Britain to track down a legion of supporters." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0462396/","name":"The Last Legion","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmJhOTMyMTMtMDc0Yi00YTg2LWE0MWUtYWY0OTBmZTMzMmU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"As the Roman empire crumbles, young Romulus Augustus flees the city and embarks on a perilous voyage to Britain to track down a legion of supporters.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0462396/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2009-07-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Features exciting fighting scenes, impressive battles and fabulous costumes","reviewBody":"This is a nice production with an average budget, great sets and thundering battles about the fall of the Roman Empire. Although the complete Roman Empire decline and fall took centuries, by the end of fifth century it was simply a battleground for warring rival Caesars and Barbarians chiefs. The Germans gather, take over and pull down the Roman gates. The Goths commanded by Odoacer(Peter Mullan), king of Herulos, invade Rome(476 AD), assesinated Orestes(Iain Glen), father of emperor Romulus Augustulos (Thomas Sangster). The young Caesar is sent to Capri along with his preceptor Ambrosinus(Ben Kingsley). A motley group of soldiers led by loyal Aurelianus (Colin Firth) are assigned by senator Nestor (John Hannah) to free him. They're accompanied by a beautiful Indian warrior named Mira (Aishwarya Rai). Without another alternative, they travel to Britannia to meet the last legion, located near the Wall of Adriano; but they're pursued by relentless barbarians (Kevin McKidd, James Cosmo). Although the Romans had partially withdrawn from Britain and its politics essentially dissolved into chaos. Later on, it's thought that a minor war lord, probably named Artos, did his best to maintain civilization and Christianity in the west of England.\n\nThis is a larger-than-life production with good direction, interesting scripting, and enthusiastic performances place this far above the usual empty-headed historical spectacle. Several action scenes are outstanding with spectacular battle images and thrilling fights. Unfortunately, on small house screens much of the splendor will be lost. You will be left with the wooden Colin Firth and the gorgeous Aishwarya Rai in a love story that was underdeveloped due tho the film's emphasis on spectacle. The picture packs colorful cinematography by Pontecorvo and evocative musical score by Patrick Doyle. The flick is professionally directed by Doug Lefler, who previously made ¨Dragonheart , a new beginning ¨. Rating : Good, it's a nice extravaganza well set in ancient Rome, done in great scale and praised for its action sequences.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":35223,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","War"],"datePublished":"2007-11-07","keywords":"roman legion,woman warrior,5th century,goths,catapult","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Last Legion","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2599747865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk0ODI5Y2QtMzU3Zi00ODJiLWJiNzYtMTFkZTQ5Mjg5NzM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk0ODI5Y2QtMzU3Zi00ODJiLWJiNzYtMTFkZTQ5Mjg5NzM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from The Weinstein Company"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000147/","name":"Colin Firth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001426/","name":"Ben Kingsley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0706787/","name":"Aishwarya Rai Bachchan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498991/","name":"Doug Lefler"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014380/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0120901/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136728/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125336/","name":"Jez Butterworth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125358/","name":"Tom Butterworth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0137363/","name":"Carlo Carlei"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

Later on, it's thought that a minor war lord, probably named Artos, did his best to maintain civilization and Christianity in the west of England.\n\nThis is a larger-than-life production with good direction, interesting scripting, and enthusiastic performances place this far above the usual empty-headed historical spectacle. Several action scenes are outstanding with spectacular battle images and thrilling fights. Unfortunately, on small house screens much of the splendor will be lost. You will be left with the wooden Colin Firth and the gorgeous Aishwarya Rai in a love story that was underdeveloped due tho the film's emphasis on spectacle. The picture packs colorful cinematography by Pontecorvo and evocative musical score by Patrick Doyle. The flick is professionally directed by Doug Lefler, who previously made ¨Dragonheart , a new beginning ¨. Rating : Good, it's a nice extravaganza well set in ancient Rome, done in great scale and praised for its action sequences.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":35223,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","War"],"datePublished":"2007-11-07","keywords":"roman legion,woman warrior,5th century,goths,catapult","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Last Legion","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2599747865","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk0ODI5Y2QtMzU3Zi00ODJiLWJiNzYtMTFkZTQ5Mjg5NzM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk0ODI5Y2QtMzU3Zi00ODJiLWJiNzYtMTFkZTQ5Mjg5NzM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from The Weinstein Company","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000147/","name":"Colin Firth","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001426/","name":"Ben Kingsley","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0706787/","name":"Aishwarya Rai Bachchan"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498991/","name":"Doug Lefler"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014380/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0120901/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136728/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125336/","name":"Jez Butterworth","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125358/","name":"Tom Butterworth","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0137363/","name":"Carlo Carlei"],"duration":"PT1H41M"</script><metacontent="
